rows.label: qst202512_msg0001
rows.name:
KOS-MOS Re:!
Are you okay?!
You're not hurt, are you?

rows.label: qst202512_msg0002
rows.name:
I am quite all right.
Are you unhurt, Astelle?

rows.label: qst202512_msg0003
rows.name: Yeah, I'm fine!

rows.label: qst202512_msg0004
rows.name: Not a scratch on me, thanks to you.

rows.label: qst202512_msg0005
rows.name: That is a relief to hear.

rows.label: qst202512_msg0006
rows.name: Um, KOS-MOS Re:... I'm sorry!

rows.label: qst202512_msg0007
rows.name:
It's all my fault that you got
dragged into this mess...

rows.label: qst202512_msg0008
rows.name: I didn't mean for this to happen...

rows.label: qst202512_msg0009
rows.name:
There is no need for concern.
Protecting you is what I am here for.

rows.label: qst202512_msg0010
rows.name: But...

rows.label: qst202512_msg0011
rows.name: So, you get it now?

rows.label: qst202512_msg0012
rows.name:
When you act selfish, you're not just
endangering yourself. People who care
about you could get hurt, too.

rows.label: qst202512_msg0013
rows.name:
Maybe you'll think twice before
demanding to come to a place like
this again.

rows.label: qst202512_msg0014
rows.name: Yeah... I'm really sorry, guys!

rows.label: qst202512_msg0015
rows.name:
No need for that. You've already
been through enough here.

rows.label: qst202512_msg0016
rows.name:
As long as you understand,
that's all that matters.

rows.label: qst202512_msg0017
rows.name:
Oh yeah, did you find what you
were looking for in the end?

rows.label: qst202512_msg0018
rows.name: Uh-huh. Look, I have it right here.

rows.label: qst202512_msg0019
rows.name: This is...some kind of machine part?

rows.label: qst202512_msg0020
rows.name: Yeah.

rows.label: qst202512_msg0021
rows.name: Listen, KOS-MOS Re:...

rows.label: qst202512_msg0022
rows.name:
When we get back to Luxuria, there's
one more thing I'd like you to do...

rows.label: qst202512_msg0023
rows.name: Would you be okay with that?

rows.label: qst202512_msg0024
rows.name: You're still not done making demands?

rows.label: qst202512_msg0025
rows.name:
That's not it! There's just...something
I want to give to KOS-MOS Re:.

rows.label: qst202512_msg0026
rows.name:
So KOS-MOS Re:, I'd like you to
come to my room.

rows.label: qst202512_msg0027
rows.name:
I promise I won't cause any more
trouble! So...please?

rows.label: qst202512_msg0028
rows.name: What do you think, Zeke?

rows.label: qst202512_msg0029
rows.name: Well...I guess there's no harm in that.

rows.label: qst202512_msg0030
rows.name: Really?! Thanks, Onii-chan!

rows.label: qst202512_msg0031
rows.name:
I swear, you really pick your times
to act all cutesy...

rows.label: qst202512_msg0032
rows.name: Are you fine with this too, KOS-MOS Re:?

rows.label: qst202512_msg0033
rows.name: Yes. I see no problem.

rows.label: qst202512_msg0034
rows.name: Then let's head on back to Luxuria.

rows.label: qst202512_msg0035
rows.name:
My room's in the Hall of Reception.
I'll see you there!
